data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: When it comes to a difficult assignment I had in school, the first thing that comes to my mind is a group presentation for a unit of study at university. It was extremely difficult as one of our group members did not work hard enough to get his part done, and other members' parts depend on his part. We decided to report this issue to the teacher and eventually, we managed to complete it because we reassigned the tasks to each member. It was a nightmare working with someone who would not cooperate. Therefore, I learned from this experience that I need to be determined to kick out someone in the group who is lagging behind.
data.referenceText: Talk about a difficult assignment you had in school, and how you completed it.
data.referenceTranslate: 谈谈你在学校完成的一项困难的作业，以及你是如何完成的。
